fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - You may choose one person during the day to Jail for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may anonymously talk with your prisoner.
- You can choose to attack your prisoner.
- The jailed target can't perform their night ability, but this is not a role block.
- If you execute a Town member, you do not forfeit further executions. Additionally, you have infinite executions, but cannot execute on the first night, and you have a one night cooldown on executions after executing someone.
- All other abilities used on the jailed person will fail; they will be notified that their target was jailed.
- Killing a player as The Jailor will cause the victim to appear to have been killed by a Jailor.
- You have priority over all other jailing type roles. If this conflicts with anything, this takes priority. (cmon it has an nk goal)
- The Jailor is considered a Town role under all circumstances **except** goal/win condition.
